review:
In the movie , vidya balan has done beautiful work. The film makes me happy when vidya and munna bhai gives roses and get well soon wishes to the elderly people. 

It is a family movie and gives unending laughing riot to the audience. 

Good luck to the team of director Rajkumar  Hirani and cast of Munna bhai.

Watch this movie whenever I tend to feel that People ignore genuinely honest and well wishing attitude.Also whenever dedication of mine is being tested. Only honesty wins. This movie is also a reminder to be human and to analyse our internal resourses before blaming others. Jai Hind.

Really good one ğŸ˜Š I have seen this movie before but not completely in my childhood. Thank God I saw this whole movie without any breaks today. I think I have watched this movie at the right time where I can understand this kind of messages in the movie. If I have seen this whole movie in my childhood today I could have ignored it.
This movie is respect for Gandhiji in true sense as it relays to the audience core Gandhian principles in a practical yet deeply moving way! Enlightening! Thus, a landmark in Indian cinema.
Very good. Whenever I get time  I used to watch this movie. As it gives  energy,  sense of humour,  and good lesson as well, one must watch this movie
